name: Defender of the energy
description:
Hello all! We are finally finish our first game for Ludum Dare 39.
It was a fun time to make something, and we proud that we finish it.
I wish you will get fun playing it, like we get fun making it :)

05.08.2017

HUGE UPDATE OUT NOW!

Featurings:

  • BRAND NEW Super Attack!
  • More polished art!
  • Sound effects!
  • Ingame options!
  • Reworked main menu!
  • New “How to play” screen!
  • Better translation!
  • Bugfixes!

You WILL like it! VERSION 1.1 IS ON!

More monsters will be in NEXT update! Follow the news!

Our latest record is 2:54, can you beat us? ;)

Thank you all!

Many people liked Audio in this game, so we make OST. You can listen it on soundcloud: soundcloud.com/tokatsu/sets/defender-of-the-energy-ost

Unity: MagicSpore and Voal

Art: MagicSpore

Game-design: Bes Slaaneshi

Audio: Tokatsu

Support developers for more updates :)

Thank you!
